comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> @Medevi 아뇨. [AdguardTeam/Scriptlets#419](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/419) 가 해결될 때까지 기다리고 있습니다.
> 
> 영상이 자동재생되지 않은 문제는 현재 치지직의 안티-애드븝록을 다루는 데 부작용을 최소한 방법을 사용하고 있어서 그렇습니다. 과거에는 PIP 버튼 없어지는 문제와 다른 시청자에 대한 채팅 관리자 옵션 접근 불가 문제가 있었습니다.
> 
> 위 issue가 해결될 때 까지 기다리는 이유는 다른 방법으로 완전한 해결을 시도하기 위함입니다.

알겠습니다. pip버튼을 만들어주는 확장프로그램을 임시로 사용해야 겟네요. 감사합니다.

comment.body:
@Medevi 아뇨. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/419 가 해결될 때까지 기다리고 있습니다.

영상이 자동재생되지 않은 문제는 현재 치지직의 안티-애드븝록을 다루는 데 부작용을 최소한 방법을 사용하고 있어서 그렇습니다.
과거에는 PIP 버튼 없어지는 문제와 다른 시청자에 대한 채팅 관리자 옵션 접근 불가 문제가 있었습니다.

위 issue가 해결될 때 까지 기다리는 이유는 다른 방법으로 완전한 해결을 시도하기 위함입니다.

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179828#issuecomment-2145023960 судя по скриншоту, расширение выключено или его нет в браузере. Проверьте его наличие в `Управление дополнениями`.

comment.body:
> > @Medevi 아래 규칙으로는 자동적으로 재생 버튼이 클릭되지나요?
> > ```
> > chzzk.naver.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', 'button[aria-label="Play"].pzp-brand-playback-button', '', '7000')
> > ```
> 
> 혹시 해당 규칙을 dns필터 편집기에다가 추가해야 되나요? 아니면, 광고차단에 필터편집기에 넣어야 되나요? 그리고 해당 규칙을 추가하면 dns 필터를 끄고 테스트하면 되는건가요?

광고차단의 필터편집기에 있는 사용자 규칙 세션에 추가하심으로써 테스트하시면 됩니다.
DNS 필터를 끄셨을 때 치지직 플레이어의 자동 재생이 안된다고 하셨으니, DNS 필터는 끄시면 됩니다.

comment.body:
> [#179869 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179869#issuecomment-2145109669)
> 
> 네? 별도의 확장프로그램 없이 PIP 버튼이 나와야 정상입니다. AdGuard DNS 필터를 꺼도 PIP 버튼이 표시되지 않나요?

정리하면, DNS 필터를 끄면 pip 버튼이 나옵니다. 하지만 재생버튼을 눌러야 되는 수고가 있죠. 
그래서 저는 재생버튼을 누르는게 귀찮아서 dns필터를 키고 치지직 기본 pip 버튼이 아닌  Chzzk-pip 라는 확장프로그램 사용해서 pip 버튼을 하나 더 생성한다고 보면 됩니다.
Dns필터를 키고 위 확장프로그램을 같이 키면 pip 버튼이 치지직의 원래 pip버튼 하나랑 확장프로그램으로 생성한 pip버튼 하나가 생성됩니다.

Подключил компьютер через мобильный интернет - всё заработало, соответственно проблема на стороне провайдера. Единственное что не могу понять, в чем причина.

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters, DNS on my end.
Try to clear browser data, leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [x] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address Sites are not yet blocked and kept being bypassed by filters as it is not yet in the block lists. - `*.goeco.social` - `*.trackswork.site` - `*.lesterunkind.top` - `*.sonraifishnet.website` Example: ### Add your comment and screenshots #### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located 0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\ Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\ Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content; 1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard Use `
` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler; 2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know. **Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots! 1. Your comment Sites loading from popups while the DNS filters are active. 2. Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Sites are not yet blocked and kept being bypassed by filters as it is not yet in the block lists.

- `*.goeco.social`
- `*.trackswork.site`
- `*.lesterunkind.top`
- `*.sonraifishnet.website`

### Proposed solution

Update filter block lists with:

> ||goeco.social^
> ||trackswork.site^
> ||lesterunkind.top^
> ||sonraifishnet.website^

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
